name: Remove the Tools Main Toolbar Menu
description:
Removes the Tools menu.  This is the sixth menu drop down list item in Firefox.
Gives you more room for extension toolbars, or buttons.   Works for Firefox 2 & Firefox 3

* Thanks to user 4639's Idea!

Additional Information:
This style works for both Firefox3 and Firefox2.
Gives you the ability to only enable the menus you use the most!

Integrates with:
- Style 7652
- Style 7651
- Style 7650
- Style 7649
- Style 7648
- Style 8024
